verses.verse: וּכְכַלּ֤וֹת <WH3615> had made an end שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> Now when Solomon לְהִתְפַּלֵּ֔ל <WH6419> of praying וְהָאֵ֗שׁ <WH784> the fire יָֽרְדָה֙ <WH3381> came down מֵֽהַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> from heaven וַתֹּ֥אכַל <WH398> and consumed הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> the burnt offering וְהַזְּבָחִ֑ים <WH2077> and the sacrifices וּכְב֥וֹד <WH3519> and the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD מָלֵ֥א <WH4390> filled אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> the house

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not יָֽכְלוּ֙ <WH3201> could הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> And the priests לָב֖וֹא <WH935> not enter אֶל־ <WH413> into בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because מָלֵ֥א <WH4390> had filled כְבוֹד־ <WH3519> because the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD'S

וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> All בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And when all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel רֹאִים֙ <WH7200> saw בְּרֶ֣דֶת <WH3381> came down הָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> how the fire וּכְב֥וֹד <WH3519> and the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> upon הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> upon the house וַיִּכְרְעוּ֩ <WH3766> they bowed אַפַּ֨יִם <WH639> themselves with their faces אַ֤רְצָה <WH776> to the ground עַל־ <WH5921> on הָרִֽצְפָה֙ <WH7531> upon the pavement וַיִּֽשְׁתַּֽחֲו֔וּ <WH7812> and worshipped וְהוֹד֤וֹת <WH3034> and praised לַיהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> Truly ט֔וֹב <WH2896> [saying] For [he is] good כִּ֥י <WH3588> truly לְעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy

וְהַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> and all the people זֹבְחִ֥ים <WH2076> offered זֶ֖בַח <WH2077> sacrifices לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

וַיִּזְבַּ֞ח <WH2076> offered הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And king שְׁלֹמֹה֮ <WH8010> Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> זֶ֣בַח <WH2077> a sacrifice הַבָּקָ֗ר <WH1241> oxen עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> of twenty וּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> and two אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand וְצֹ֕אן <WH6629> sheep מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> and an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> and twenty אָ֑לֶף <WH505> thousand וַֽיַּחְנְכוּ֙ <WH2596> dedicated אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> so the king וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> and all the people

וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֞ים <WH3548> And the priests עַל־ <WH5921> at מִשְׁמְרוֹתָ֣ם <WH4931> on their offices עֹמְדִ֗ים <WH5975> waited וְהַלְוִיִּ֞ם <WH3881> the Levites בִּכְלֵי־ <WH3627> also with instruments שִׁ֤יר <WH7892> of musick יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֜ה <WH6213> had made דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> which David הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> the king לְהֹד֤וֹת <WH3034> to praise לַיהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּ֔וֹ <WH2617> because his mercy בְּהַלֵּ֥ל <WH1984> praised דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> when David בְּיָדָ֑ם <WH3027> by their ministry וְהַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> and the priests [מַחֲצֹצְרִים כ] (מַחְצְרִ֣ים <WH2690> blow ק) נֶגְדָּ֔ם <WH5048> the other וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> before them and all Israel עֹמְדִֽים׃ <WH5975> stood ס

וַיְקַדֵּ֣שׁ <WH6942> hallowed שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> Moreover Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> תּ֤וֹךְ <WH8432> the middle הֶֽחָצֵר֙ <WH2691> of the court אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> that [was] before בֵית־ <WH1004> the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because עָ֤שָׂה <WH6213> for there he offered שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there הָֽעֹל֔וֹת <WH5930> burnt offerings וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> חֶלְבֵ֣י <WH2459> and the fat הַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <WH8002> of the peace offerings כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because מִזְבַּ֤ח <WH4196> altar הַנְּחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH5178> because the brasen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> had made שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> which Solomon לֹ֣א <WH3808> was not יָכ֗וֹל <WH3201> was not able לְהָכִ֛יל <WH3557> to receive אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹלָ֥ה <WH5930> the burnt offerings וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> and the meat offerings וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֲלָבִֽים׃ <WH2459> and the fat

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> kept שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> הֶ֠חָג <WH2282> the feast בָּעֵ֨ת <WH6256> Also at the same time הַהִ֜יא <WH1931> he שִׁבְעַ֤ת <WH7651> seven יָמִים֙ <WH3117> days וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> and all Israel עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with קָהָ֖ל <WH6951> congregation גָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> great מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> with him a very מִלְּב֥וֹא <WH935> from the entering in חֲמָ֖ת <WH2574> of Hamath עַד־ <WH5704> against נַ֥חַל <WH5158> unto the river מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֛וּ <WH6213> they made בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֖י <WH8066> And in the eighth עֲצָ֑רֶת <WH6116> a solemn assembly כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for חֲנֻכַּ֣ת <WH2598> the dedication הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ <WH4196> of the altar עָשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> for they kept שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> days וְהֶחָ֖ג <WH2282> and the feast שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> seven יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

וּבְי֨וֹם <WH3117> day עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> and twentieth וּשְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> And on the three לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> of the seventh שִׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> away אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> the people לְאָהֳלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH168> into their tents שְׂמֵחִים֙ <WH8056> glad וְט֣וֹבֵי <WH2896> and merry לֵ֔ב <WH3820> in heart עַל־ <WH5921> because הַטּוֹבָ֗ה <WH2896> for the goodness אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> had shewed יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> that the LORD לְדָוִ֣יד <WH1732> unto David וְלִשְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> and to Solomon וּלְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and to Israel עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> his people

וַיְכַ֧ל <WH3615> finished שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <WH8010> Thus Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king's וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַבָּ֜א <WH935> and all that came עַל־ <WH5921> and לֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> into Solomon's לַעֲשׂ֧וֹת <WH6213> to make בְּבֵית־ <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּבְבֵית֖וֹ <WH1004> and in his own house הִצְלִֽיחַ׃ <WH6743> he prosperously effected פ

וַיֵּרָ֧א <WH7200> appeared יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> to Solomon בַּלָּ֑יְלָה <WH3915> by night וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֗וֹ שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH8085> unto him I have heard אֶת־ <WH853> תְּפִלָּתֶ֔ךָ <WH8605> thy prayer וּבָחַ֜רְתִּי <WH977> and have chosen בַּמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> this place הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> this לִ֖י לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> to myself for an house זָֽבַח׃ <WH2077> of sacrifice

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> If אֶֽעֱצֹ֤ר <WH6113> I shut up הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> heaven וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> is no יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become מָטָ֔ר <WH4306> that there be no rain וְהֵן־ <WH2005> if אֲצַוֶּ֥ה <WH6680> or if I command עַל־ <WH5921> and חָגָ֖ב <WH2284> the locusts לֶאֱכ֣וֹל <WH398> to devour הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land וְאִם־ <WH518> if אֲשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> or if I send דֶּ֖בֶר <WH1698> pestilence בְּעַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> among my people

וְיִכָּנְע֨וּ <WH3665> shall humble עַמִּ֜י <WH5971> If my people אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> who נִֽקְרָא־ <WH7121> which are called שְׁמִ֣י <WH8034> by my name עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5921> and וְיִֽתְפַּֽלְלוּ֙ <WH6419> themselves and pray וִֽיבַקְשׁ֣וּ <WH1245> and seek פָנַ֔י <WH6440> my face וְיָשֻׁ֖בוּ <WH7725> and turn מִדַּרְכֵיהֶ֣ם <WH1870> ways הָרָעִ֑ים <WH7451> from their wicked וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> I אֶשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> then will I hear מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> from heaven וְאֶסְלַח֙ <WH5545> and will forgive לְחַטָּאתָ֔ם <WH2403> their sin וְאֶרְפָּ֖א <WH7495> and will heal אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצָֽם׃ <WH776> their land

עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now עֵינַי֙ <WH5869> Now mine eyes יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become פְתֻח֔וֹת <WH6605> shall be open וְאָזְנַ֖י <WH241> and mine ears קַשֻּׁב֑וֹת <WH7183> attent לִתְפִלַּ֖ת <WH8605> unto the prayer הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> [that is made] in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now בָּחַ֤רְתִּי <WH977> For now have I chosen וְהִקְדַּ֙שְׁתִּי֙ <WH6942> and sanctified אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֣יִת <WH1004> this house הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this לִהְיוֹת־ <WH1961> become שְׁמִ֥י <WH8034> that my name שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> may be there עַד־ <WH5704> may be there for עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> ever וְהָי֨וּ <WH1961> become עֵינַ֧י <WH5869> and mine eyes וְלִבִּ֛י <WH3820> and mine heart שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> will be there כָּל־ <WH3605> shall be there הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> shall be there perpetually

וְאַתָּ֞ה <WH859> you אִם־ <WH518> if תֵּלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> walked לְפָנַ֗י <WH6440> before כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after הָלַךְ֙ <WH1980> walked דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> me as David אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> thy father וְלַעֲשׂ֕וֹת <WH6213> and do כְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> i צִוִּיתִ֑יךָ <WH6680> according to all that I have commanded וְחֻקַּ֥י <WH2706> my statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <WH4941> and my judgments תִּשְׁמֽוֹר׃ <WH8104> thee and shalt observe

וַהֲקִ֣ימוֹתִ֔י <WH6965> Then will I stablish אֵ֖ת <WH853> כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> the throne מַלְכוּתֶ֑ךָ <WH4438> of thy kingdom כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> I כָּרַ֗תִּי <WH3772> according as I have covenanted לְדָוִ֤יד <WH1732> with David אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> thy father לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יִכָּרֵ֤ת <WH3772> There shall not fail לְךָ֙ אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> thee a man מוֹשֵׁ֖ל <WH4910> [to be] ruler בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel

וְאִם־ <WH518> if תְּשׁוּב֣וּן <WH7725> But if ye turn away אַתֶּ֔ם <WH859> you וַעֲזַבְתֶּם֙ <WH5800> and forsake חֻקּוֹתַ֣י <WH2708> my statutes וּמִצְוֹתַ֔י <WH4687> and my commandments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> which I have set לִפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> before וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֗ם <WH1980> you and shall go וַעֲבַדְתֶּם֙ <WH5647> and serve אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> other וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶ֖ם <WH7812> and worship לָהֶֽם׃

וּנְתַשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH5428> Then will I pluck them up by the roots מֵעַ֤ל <WH5921> from אַדְמָתִי֙ <WH127> out of my land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> which I have given לָהֶ֔ם וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> them and this house הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> and this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הִקְדַּ֣שְׁתִּי <WH6942> which I have sanctified לִשְׁמִ֔י <WH8034> for my name אַשְׁלִ֖יךְ <WH7993> will I cast out מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> of פָּנָ֑י <WH6440> of my sight וְאֶתְּנֶ֛נּוּ <WH5414> and will make לְמָשָׁ֥ל <WH4912> it [to be] a proverb וְלִשְׁנִינָ֖ה <WH8148> and a byword בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> among all nations

וְהַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> And this house הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become עֶלְי֔וֹן <WH5945> which is high לְכָל־ <WH3605> everyone עֹבֵ֥ר <WH5674> to every one that passeth עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and יִשֹּׁ֑ם <WH8074> shall be an astonishment וְאָמַ֗ר <WH559> by it so that he shall say בַּמֶּ֨ה <WH4100> Why עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> done יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Why hath the LORD כָּ֔כָה <WH3602> thus לָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> thus unto this land הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise וְלַבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> house הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וְאָמְר֗וּ <WH559> And it shall be answered עַל֩ <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who עָֽזְב֜וּ <WH5800> Because they forsook אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God אֲבֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH1> of their fathers אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who הוֹצִיאָם֮ <WH3318> which brought them forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <WH4714> of Egypt וַֽיַּחֲזִ֙יקוּ֙ <WH2388> and laid hold בֵּאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> on other וַיִּשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ <WH7812> and worshipped לָהֶ֖ם וַיַּֽעַבְד֑וּם <WH5647> them and served עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> after that הֵבִ֣יא <WH935> them therefore hath he brought עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> and אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> all this evil הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise פ
